import React, {Component} from 'react' import './App.css' import { BrowserRouter, Route} from 'react-router-dom' import RSVP from './components/RSVP' import Ceremony from './components/Ceremony' import Reception from './components/Reception' import Afterparty from './components/Afterparty' import TopPane from'./components/TopPane'; import Registry from './components/Registry'; import Accommodations from './components/Accommodations'; class App extends Component { handleEnter = (e) => { this.setState({ ticker:e.toUpperCase() }) } render() { return (
{/* */}
); } } export default App;
